mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOCAL_LIKES (LIKES_ID, LOCAL_ID, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_LIKE) VALUES (LOCAL_LIKES_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{localId}, #{memberId}, #{memberLike})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN MEMBER_LIKE = 1 THEN 1 END) AS LIKECOUNT, COUNT(CASE WHEN MEMBER_LIKE = 2 THEN 1 END) AS DISLIKECOUNT, FROM LOCAL_LIKES WHERE LOCAL_ID = #{localId}
